values: 斑点；污点；污迹；污渍；脏点；地点；地方；位置；场所；少量；几滴；小片；现货交易；现金支付；现金购买；小额钞票；（用于混合石膏的）灰泥板；石膏板；（人体的）部位；（事物的）部分；粉刺；丘疹；疱疹；脓疱；职位；职务；（舞台上的）聚光灯；短暂广告时间；短期广告时间；节目；节目档；某演员的固定节目；<口>困境；窘境；娱乐场所；<美俚>…年徒刑；平口鲾；斑头鸽；置球点

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有斑点的；斑纹的；弄污的
发现（spot的过去分词）；玷污；弄上污痕
发疹的；多斑点的；质量不一的
沾上污渍；散布；用点装饰（spot的ing形式）
着弹点观察员；监视人；测位仪；检路器

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
指某物设置的方向或地点。
常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。
指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。

word_group.brief_definition: 当场, 立刻, 现场
风景点, 游览胜地；美人斑, 美人痣, 人工美人斑
热岛；火山活动区；有重要活动的地方；非常危险的地方；热点
盲点；视线被挡住的地方；死角；静区；偏见；无知；不理解
最重要的部分；最快乐的时刻
发挥正当作用, 适得其用, 恰到好处

bilingual.source: She has a small spot on her face.
There is a dark red spot on the wall.
bilingual.target: 墙上有一个暗红色的斑点。

bilingual.source: There is a red spot on her skirt.
bilingual.target: 她的裙子上有一个红色的斑点。

bilingual.source: She noticed a whitish spot on the leaf.
bilingual.target: 她注意到叶子上有一个发白的斑点。

bilingual.source: I found a black spot on the dog's back.
bilingual.target: 我在狗的背上发现了一个黑色的斑点。

bilingual.source: The fur of a leopard has unique spot patterns.
bilingual.target: 美洲豹的皮毛有独特的斑点图案。

bilingual.source: There is a small red spot on her white of the eye.
bilingual.target: 她的白眼珠上有一小块红色斑点。

bilingual.source: Spot and Stripe are the first tiger cubs (幼兽) that have ever been born here.
bilingual.target: "斑点"和"条纹"是第一批在这里出生的小老虎。

bilingual.source: Spot leaf yew podocarpus face of blade has white spot.
bilingual.target: 斑叶罗汉松，叶面有白色斑点。
我的光秃的斑点不见了么？

list.abstract: SPOT（英 [spɒt]，美 [spɑːt]），英语单词。作名词时指斑点、一个特定的地方、粉刺；作动词时指发现、注意到、认出。短语搭配有spot on（十分精确的）。例句有“Demonstrating their superiority on the spot.（在现场展示他们的优势。）” SPOT的近义词名词有location、及物动词有recognize、形容词有on-site、副词有just。

SPOT (Small Programmable Object Technology) 是运行 Java™ 程序的小型无线设备。SPOT 载有很多传感器，用于监视它的环境，还有一组彩色 LED 用于与外部通信，以及两个用于提供基本反馈的按钮。我使用 LED 来显示构建的状态。可以通过一条 USB 线将一些 SPOT 连接起来，作为一个基站，其他 SPOT 可以通过这个基站访问工作站上的资源，例如数据库或 Web 应用程序。

yingyinNormal.en: Once we paint it, we furnish it, we fix the electric, redo the plumbing, and figure out why that brown spot won't stop growing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只等我们刷上漆，配上家具，修好电路，重新铺好水管，搞清楚那块棕色斑点为何还在变大就行。

yingyinNormal.en: You're sitting in my spot. You don't have a spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你坐到我的专座上了。你哪有专座啊。

yingyinNormal.en: This is our spot! Get outta here!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我们的地头！离开这里！

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. That's my spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那无关紧要，那停车位是我的。

yingyinNormal.en: That shouldn't be too hard to spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那应该不难鉴别的吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've got a soft spot for Armageddon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还对《世界末日》情有独钟。

yingyinNormal.en: You're in our spot. This is where we sit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们占了我们的位置。这是我们坐的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. 294? Yeah. That's my parking spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，294号位吗？是的。那是我的停车位。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, they gave me a great spot. Right by Macys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我分到梅西百货旁当红位子。

yingyinNormal.en: One bright spot though: she did drop her phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 倒是有个好消息，她手机掉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Penny. Hello, Sheldon. You're in my spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，佩妮。嗨，谢尔顿。你坐在我的专座上了。

yingyinNormal.en: This looks like just the spot for our picnic. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个地方看上去很适合我们野餐啊。好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: This looks like just the spot for our picnic. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个地方看上去很适合我们野餐啊。好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: Dude, I'm sorry. But hey, there's one spot left, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 老兄，我很抱歉，但是，还有一个名额不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What is he doing? He's finding the acoustic sweet spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他干嘛呢？他在找听觉最优点。

yingyinNormal.en: You're in my spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你占了我的专属座位。

yingyinNormal.en: The Mountain Beauty Spot is now a big hole. It's a cave now. Welcome to the Cave Beauty Spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美丽的大山风景区现在变成了一个大大的坑。现在它变成了一个洞穴了，欢迎大家到洞穴风景区游玩。

yingyinNormal.en: The Mountain Beauty Spot is now a big hole. It's a cave now. Welcome to the Cave Beauty Spot. Woo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美丽的大山风景区现在变成了一个大大的坑。现在它变成了一个洞穴了，欢迎大家到洞穴风景区游玩。哦！

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. Hey. Hey. Sorry, Sheldon, I'll move. Eh, why? My spot, your spot what difference does it make?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，谢尔顿，我这就挪开。何必呢？我的位置，你的位置，有区别吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I think you've hit a sore spot, Sherlock. Like I'm some kind of credit junkie. Definitely a sore spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好像戳到痛处了，夏洛克，好像我抢功劳有瘾一样。绝对是痛处。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 场所; 地点; 地方
污迹; 污渍; 玷污
几滴; 少量; 一点

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area or place
sense_info_list.zh: 场所; 地点; 地方

examination_example.sentence: When we look at a face or a picture, our eyes pause on one <highlight>spot</highlight> at a time, often on the eyes or mouth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们看一张脸或一幅画时，我们的眼睛每次停留在一个点上，通常是眼睛或嘴巴上。

examination_example.sentence: These pauses typically occur at about three per second, and the eyes then jump to another <highlight>spot</highlight>, until several important points in the image are registered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些停顿通常以每秒3次的速度发生，然后眼睛会跳到另一个点，直到图像中的几个重要点被记录下来。

sense_info_list.en: exactly right

examination_example.sentence: Her critique of the lameness of many public-health campaigns is <highlight>spot</highlight>-on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对许多公共卫生运动的不足之处的批评非常准确。

sense_info_list.en: see, notice, or recognize someone or something that is difficult to detect or that one is searching for

examination_example.sentence: Even in dense forest, you should be able to <highlight>spot</highlight> gaps in the tree line due to roads and train tracks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在茂密的森林中，你也应该能够发现由于道路和火车轨道而造成的树线间隙。

sense_info_list.en: a position in a competition or an event
connected with a system of trading where goods are delivered and paid for immediately after sale

sense_info_list.zh: 污迹; 污渍; 玷污

sense_info_list.en: a small mark or lump on a person's skin, sometimes with a yellow head to it
a small round or roundish mark, differing in color or texture from the surface around it
in a difficult situation
a part of a television, radio show that is given to a entertainer or type of entertainment
a small amount of something
sense_info_list.zh: 几滴; 少量; 一点

sense_info_list.en: immediately
to give your opponent or the other team an advantage

word_usage.usage: spot作动词指“看见；看出；发现”时，不用于进行时。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 斑点; 污渍; 弄脏

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area or place

examination_example.sentence: Instead of relaxing, I was looking for the best <highlight>spot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起放松，我在寻找更好的地方。

sense_info_list.en: see, notice, or recognize someone or something that is difficult to detect or that one is searching for

examination_example.sentence: These apps know where almost all the users are, they can <highlight>spot</highlight> traffic congestion (堵塞) very quickly and suggest ways round it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些应用程序几乎知道所有用户的位置，它们可以非常迅速地发现交通拥堵，并提出绕过拥堵的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Lions are primarily ambush (埋伏) hunters, so when they feel their prey has <highlight>spotted</highlight> them, they usually give up on the hunt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狮子主要埋伏猎手，所以当它们觉察到猎物发现它们时，他们通常会放弃狩猎。

sense_info_list.en: a position in a competition or an event
a small round or roundish mark, differing in color or texture from the surface around it
sense_info_list.zh: 斑点; 污渍; 弄脏

exam_freq_info.chinese: 斑点; 污渍; 弄脏

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有斑点的；有圆点装饰的

word_family.mean: n. 斑点；一个特定的地方；粉刺；丘疹；一点点；现货交易；现金交易；调灰泥板；调石膏板；钞票

sense_info_list.en: see; notice; or recognize someone or something that is difficult to detect or that one is searching for

examination_example.sentence: A deadly fish has been <highlight>spotted</highlight> in the Mediterranean waters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在地中海水域发现了一条致命的鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Aerial survey team <highlight>spotted</highlight> a mum with two babies in Cape Cod Bay a day earlier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天前，空中调查队在科德湾角发现了一位带着两个婴儿的妈妈。

examination_example.sentence: In all, seven baby whales have been <highlight>spotted</highlight> so far this year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年到目前为止，总共发现了七只小鲸鱼。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area or place

examination_example.sentence: She would be able to visit more scenic <highlight>spots</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她可以参观更多的景点。

examination_example.sentence: Chains big enough to fall under the rule will face penalties of up to 2, 000 dollars for not showing calorie information in a prominent <highlight>spot</highlight> on their menus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 足够大型的连锁店将面临最高2000美元的罚款，因其未在菜单的显著位置显示卡路里信息。

sense_info_list.en: a position in a competition or an event

examination_example.sentence: There's widespread disagreement over whether breakfast should keep its top <highlight>spot</highlight> in the hierarchy (等级) of meals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，对于早餐是否应该在一日三餐的排序中高居头把交椅，是普遍存在分歧的。

sense_info_list.en: a small round or roundish mark; differing in color or texture from the surface around it
sense_info_list.zh: 斑点; 污渍; 弄脏

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area or place

examination_example.sentence: You have to make sure you find the repeats in the music when you have to go back to the right <highlight>spot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你不得不回到正确的位置时，你必须确保你在音乐中找到重复。

examination_example.sentence: It's a good idea to choose a(n) alternative destination in case your first-choice tourist <highlight>spot</highlight> is not available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择备选目的地是个好主意，以防你的首选旅游景点不接待。

examination_example.sentence: Reserve your <highlight>spot</highlight> before availability – and the cherry blossoms – disappear!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在樱花盛开之前预订您的位置！

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Spot</highlight> and Stripe are the first tiger cubs (幼兽)  that have ever been born here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “斑点”和“条纹”是第一批在这里出生的小老虎。

examination_example.sentence: When <highlight>Spot</highlight> and Stripe were four months old, they were learning how to open doors and jump fences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当Spot和Stripe四个月大的时候，他们正在学习如何开门和跳栅栏。

examination_example.sentence: Why did the author decide to send <highlight>Spot</highlight> and Stripe back to the zoo?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者为什么决定把斑点和条纹送回动物园？

sense_info_list.en: see, notice, or recognize someone or something that is difficult to detect or that one is searching for

examination_example.sentence: On the way, we <highlight>spotted</highlight> a man holding a piece of paper that said, " Lost my job."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在路上，我们看到一个人拿着一张写着“我失业了”的纸条。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 喜欢寻找…的人；侦察机；航空侦察员；秘密监视员；现场监护人员

word_family.mean: n. 斑点；一个特定的地方；粉刺；丘疹；一点点；现货交易；现金交易；调灰泥板；调石膏板；钞票

sense_info_list.en: a small round area that has a different colour or feels different from the surface it is on

examination_example.sentence: She is brown with <highlight>spots</highlight>, with long ears, and she was energetic, so we thought she'd be strong, like her mom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她是棕色的，带着斑点，耳朵很长，精力充沛，所以我们认为她会像她妈妈一样很强壮。

examination_example.sentence: As we see in the picture, a white <highlight>spot</highlight> is in the black area and a black <highlight>spot</highlight> is in the white area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如我们在图片中看到的，一个白点在黑色区域，一个黑点在白色区域。

examination_example.sentence: She drew white <highlight>spots</highlight> (小圆点) on the raccoon to show dew.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她在浣熊身上画了白色的斑点来显示露水。

sense_info_list.en: a particular area or place
